Reviews.Title: Toshiba Waranty is no good. Don't Buy Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Don Crow
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop in july 2013. I even gave $28.00 for extended warranty. In Sept.2013 I turned it Off one night & went to bed. The next morning when I turned it on I got a screen asking for a BIOS password. I have never set a password for Bios. I could not get it on. So I called Toshiba support & told them about the Bios password problem. They had me try a few things while I was on the phone with them, but nothing worked. So they said I'd have to send it to their repair depot to be repaired. I had a choice of boxing it myself & sending it & be responsible for damages during shipping Or buy their box for $24.95. To be on the safe side I bought their $25.00 box. Four days after it arrived at their repair depot I got an email saying that repair was on hold because the main board had to be replaced & that it wasn't covered under warranty. I freaked!. I emailed the repair depot & ask them how could a 3 month old laptop main board not be covered under warranty. Four hours later they emailed me back & said I didn't send them a BIOS password & to either send them a BIOS password or $114.00 to repair it or it would be sent back to me unrepaired. Well I spent an hour on the phone with hump teen different people in Toshiba support. They all said that the BIOS password problem was not covered under the warranty even if I never set one. Bottom line..their warranty is useless. I told them to send it back to me unrepaired. LET IT BE KNOWN..TOSHIBA CORP.HAS GOT THE LAST PENNY FROM Don in Alabama. So if your thinking of buying a Toshiba product..you better hope you won't need the warranty. I actually have three Toshiba laptops but I will never buy a Toshiba product again because of this experience.Open this link  [...]

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Deanne Adler
Reviews.Content: I'm enjoying this computer and so far, after a couple of weeks, I'm having no problems with it. Windows 8 takes some getting used to but it's easier than I expected.  When I go into normal programs I use the desk top which is readily available in the start menu.  I don't use all of the programs in the start menu by choice.  Some of them are great. Others I just have no interest in. The display is beautiful and sharp. As of now I am very happy with this purchase.  I would give it a 5 star rating but it's to new.

Reviews.Title: not for touch typist
Reviews.Author: Faye P
Reviews.Content: I thought this would be the perfect laptop for me. My husband has a Toshiba laptop. I also have a Toshiba laptop which is several years old and needs replacing. We both have loved Toshiba. Not any more. The keyboard on this new one is very non-responsive (bad news for a touch typist like me) and the spacebar never responds unless I stop typing and press it very deliberatly and very hard. Amazon customer service has accepted it for return and refund. They have been most understanding.

Reviews.Title: The graphics card amazed me
Reviews.Author: Dequane Thomas
Reviews.Content: I have to say when I got it first and saw the specifications on the processor being 1.10gHz I was upset to see such a small processing speed, but I don't know what Toshiba did but the graphics card, sound card and unique processing quality was somewhat mind-blowing. For someone that is getting a laptop for the first time or wants something small that packs a punch to be used for business but still wanna play a few game (for me it was fifa 13) but still rock out to music, I can say this pc is capable of doing that.

Reviews.Title: Worst laptop ever purchased
Reviews.Author: Jill C. Howard
Reviews.Content: This is the worst laptop I have ever used. The keyboard is hard to use, the keys have to be struck hard, making speed typing impossible. The speakers are horrible. They sound tinny, and they crackle at higher levels. Burning CD's is impossible. The burned CD's skip all over the place. Customer service at Toshiba is non-existent.  I have owned this computer a little over 30 days and can't wait to replace it. Stick with Dell. It also takes forever to load. My 6 yr. old desktop loads faster than this laptop. Do NOT waste your money! The only bright spot is the customer service at Amazon. They are helping me to try to solve these problems.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mackenzie Cooper
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this computer! arrived when it was supposed, everything is exactly perfect! Its taking me awhile to get use to it because I was used to an apple laptop. I couldn't have got a better laptop for such a deal! Its working so well with my online college classes.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Ray&eva
Reviews.Content: The operating system took some getting used to. It still takes me longer to navigate. The quality is about what you'd expect from a computer at this price.

Reviews.Title: I wish I had returned before time ran out
Reviews.Author: lynn buck
Reviews.Content: This is a nice computer but it has serious freeze and mouse problems. Windows 8 is not the best thing either.

Reviews.Title: Gift for our daughter
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Hutchison
Reviews.Content: Our daughter's 10-yr old computer died so we sent her a Toshiba laptop which was just like the one we have.  She is as thrilled with hers as we are with ours !

Reviews.Title: Great laptop, bad speakers.
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: Purchased this mostly for messing around, but also use it for school work. Although windows 8 took a little to get use to, this computer is fast and reliable. Can burn disks without much trouble, though I've noticed that if you move it around a lot while it's burning, the disk may turn out a little choppy. So I just set it down while it does it's thing. The speakers on the other hand are pretty bad, they don't project well at all. If you turn it up loud, it becomes crackly. I recommend using a nice headset or plugin speaker, as I use. Picture is great for movies, youtube, ect. So other than the sound, this laptop has made me happy since day one and its gets the job done. I'm very satisfied with my purchase. Hope I helped some people.

Reviews.Title: Works very well!
Reviews.Author: Lance B.
Reviews.Content: No problems.  I bought this for my son.  Although I am not too fond of the Windows 8 platform, I believe he is very happy with it.  Furthermore, I recommend Kingsoft apps in replacement of Office Powerpoint, Excel, and Word.  It works very well with the Windows 8 platform.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer. Awesome Deal. Needed more Ram
Reviews.Author: Jessica Mattarella
Reviews.Content: I could not find a better deal for this type of computer.  Windows 8 slowed the computer down but once I doubled the ram in the computer, it's much much faster.  I would definitely purchase a computer like this again.

Reviews.Title: You get what you paid for
Reviews.Author: Jorge B.
Reviews.Content: (excuse my ortografy english is a 2do language) For 300 bucks is a fine pc.... Toshiba is prety much reliable brand..... materials are cheap but it's performance is grate.....

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Dennis W.Ray
Reviews.Content: The quality and ease of use makes this an outstanding purchase.  Windows 8 was a little difficult to get to learn but now works great.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop!!
Reviews.Author: Terri Reynolds
Reviews.Content: This is a nice machine. Lightweight. Powerful. Right number key pad. The color is good. Runs a lot cooler than my last one. Once nice laptop!!!

Reviews.Title: excellent laptop
Reviews.Author: LANETTA DARSELE GARRETT
Reviews.Content: it can on time and packed well. The  laptop is a great value for the price. I would buy it again

Reviews.Title: Afforidable and reliable
Reviews.Author: Jack Menough
Reviews.Content: If you looking for a well priced computer.. look no further than this. It's smooth ,does everything as described and very reliable. It's better than any computer you'd buy at Wal-Mart.

Reviews.Title: good value for the money
Reviews.Author: Steve-o "the big kahuna"
Reviews.Content: Got my wife a Toshiba satellite a few years ago and it's working just fine.  This came up on sale and given my earlier luck, I bought it online for $260.  So far, it's excellent.  Very fast and windows 8 is intuitive and fairly easy to work with so far.  It's not a thousand dollar computer, but for what I need it for, it's just fine.  This is a fine computer for the money and I'm rolling right along with it.

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my daughter
Reviews.Author: James C. Meese
Reviews.Content: It was a birthday present and she need a new laptop. She is still setting it up for her needs and she loves the wide variety of uses it provides her in both her work and recreation.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: joseph drinkhorn
Reviews.Content: should have a remote mouse if you have numberness in your hands. every thing else works fine.very happy with it

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: maria boyer
Reviews.Content: Good day, I am very happy with my new laptop, it made ​​me lack. I recommend it!! I have been very useful. thanks again! up soon

Reviews.Title: Not a fan of Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Happy Down South
Reviews.Content: Not a fan of Windows 8.  My husband and I are seniors and we already own a Toshiba Satellite that we purchased 6 years ago. This new one is hard for us to get used to.  I know that it's the Windows 8, not the laptop itself.As far as the looks, feel and easy to read keys, it's more than enough for our needs.Toshiba is a great product with a long life.  I would say that if you just want to download photos, surf the internet and check your e mail, this is more than enough.  Since that is about all we know how to do, we have no complaints and highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: A decent enough laptop - keyboard is awful
Reviews.Author: WriterMarc
Reviews.Content: For $400 bucks it's about what you'd expect. It's got Windows 8 on it, and the apps often run, making the computer slow at times. The keyboard is awful for me at least. I have typed worse on this keyboard than on any other. But your mileage may vary on that point. Otherwise, it's decent. Screen is a good size, it's light-weight, and it does what I need it to do. If it had Windows XP on it, I would like it better, but the laptop itself is decent for the price.

Screen Size: 15.6"
Screen Resolution: 1366 x 768
Processor Type: Intel
Processor Model: Celeron 847
Processor Speed: 1.1GHz
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba 15.6" Satellite Laptop 4GB 320GB | C855-S5118
